articles.description: "Ryan Reynolds has a lot of really famous friends."
articles.content:
Free Guy has been a big hit at the box office and certainly had some surprises in store for anybody who saw it this weekend.
"Ryan Reynolds has a lot of really famous friends and he got a lot of the… [+5691 chars]
